getGroupByUid: select ?? from `group` where id = (select gid from `usergroup` where uid = ?)
getUserByGid: select ?? from `user` where id = (select uid from `usergroup` where gid = ?)
getVendorByUid: select ?? from `vendor` where id = (select vid from `uservendor` where uid = ?)
getMangeByUid: select ?? from `vendor` where id in (select vid from `uservendor` where uid = ?&&role='ROLE_USER')
getUserByVid: select ?? from `user` where id = (select uid from `uservendor` where vid = ?)
findSignedByUid: SELECT ?? FROM `serviceData` WHERE id IN(SELECT sd FROM `serviceResult` WHERE uid=? ) ORDER BY `ts` DESC  LIMIT ?,?
findAllSignedByUid: SELECT * FROM `serviceData` WHERE id IN(SELECT sd FROM `serviceResult` WHERE uid=? && status=-1 ) ORDER BY `ts` DESC LIMIT ?,?
